JobFullDesc: The Uber Technical Program Management (TPM) team plays a critical role in structuring and executing impactful org-wide initiatives to increase the effectiveness of our product and engineering organizations. As a senior TPM focused on engineering-wide initiatives, you’ll work closely with Ark, a senior engineer council, to drive engineering architecture, culture, and standards to be more effective, reliable, and sustainable. This role will partner closely with engineers to organize, design, and execute programs that improve engineering standards, develop engineering talent, and allow engineers to innovate to solve Uber’s business problems. What You’ll Do:  Drive tech-wide program initiatives that improve the operational execution capability of the engineering organization.Drive engineering tooling best practices and enable tech wide program initiatives to automate execution.Work with the leads of Ark, a senior engineer council, to drive their vision for engineering-wide decisions and programs.Manage the process for large-scale engineering design reviews. Engage appropriate stakeholders to ensure informed decisions are made.Work cross-functionally to create new programs to foster a community amongst senior engineers from different teams and locations across the globe.Interact regularly with senior engineering leaders to share appropriate updates on the impact of Ark’s initiatives. Basic Qualifications:  BA/BS degree or equivalent experience Minimum of 2 years experience as a program manager in a fast-paced, global engineering environmentExperience managing multiple projects in a fast-paced environment, with the ability to meet tight deadlinesExperience in creating or implementing technical solutions to improve program efficiencyExcellent verbal and written communication, especially with senior-level engineering stakeholders Preferred Qualifications:  Proven understanding of the software development life cycle, and how that may be applied in large engineering organizations. Engineers enjoy working closely with you.Shown strong cross-team and cross-org stakeholder management. Ability to influence, motivate, and align people across a broad variety of job functions through your relationships.Strong organizational skills to juggle many tasks without losing sight of the highest priority items.Analytical and truth seeking. Ability to understand complex concepts and make reasoned decisions objectively.
